snippet: The punishment for a teenage sexual encounter with a girl who lied about her age prompted a nationwide call to change sex offender registries.
abstract: Judge Angela M Pasula of Berrien County District Court in Michigan sentences Zachery Anderson, 19-year-old arrested for having sex with girl who lied about her age, to two years' probation under state's Holmes Youthful Trainee Act, special status for young offenders that previous judge had denied him; Anderson was granted new hearing after he and his parents protested original sentence, which required him to join sex offender registry and serve 90 days in jail.
lead_paragraph: The punishment for a teenage sexual encounter with a girl who lied about her age prompted a nationwide call to change sex offender registries.

headline.main: Sex Registry Challenge Cuts Penalty for Man, 19
headline.print_headline: Penalty Cut After Sex Registry Challenge
